name: Puchi Nikki
summary: Puchi Nikki is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame made in SmileBoom's Puchicon app (otherwise known as Petit Computer in other regions) for DSi. Players take the role of an unnamed person with long black hair and white clothes, who starts off in a Japanese style room and is able to leave it to enter the Nexus. There is no in-game text to be found, with everything menu-wise being represented by icons.
